items.sentence: The constant, high-pitched ringing in Tom\'s ears is driving him crazy.
The food wasn\'t very delicious, but otherwise the party was a success.
Mary came home from school in tears because her friends had teased her.
Mary once again tried on all the clothes she had bought the day before.
Tom hoped that Mary would consider visiting a few art museums with him.
Tom said he heard Mary singing this morning behind the school building.
Tom speaks French only just a little bit better than he speaks English.
Tom was fed up with eating the low quality food provided by the prison.
Tom went to Boston without even telling me he was planning to go there.
The only reason I got blamed was that the boss needed someone to blame.
